title: Courgette pasta bake
ingredients: ['225g (8oz) uncooked pasta', '1 vegetable stock cube', '4 courgettes, diced', '2 red onions, finely sliced', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 red chilli, sliced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '600g tomato passata', '1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper', '3 tablespoons virtually fat-free fromage frais', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
